text: Father Bernard Kinvi is a Roman Catholic priest, a monk of the Order of Saint Camillus. He is the head of a Catholic mission in Bossemptele in Central African Republic. He was awarded the Alison Des Forges Award for Extraordinary Activism by Human Rights Watch for protecting Muslim refugees in his church. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Bernard Kinvi
